Meghan Markle is set to have her wedding next month, but sources claim the actress has left the country in recent news.

The 36-year-old Suits actress, who has been dating Prince Harry for two years, left the UK last week.

But royal fans needn’t worry - the royal-to-be is not getting cold feet.

According to a source Meghan Markle flew back to her hometown of Los Angeles.

The brunette is spending time with her mother Doria Ragland before the wedding, E! News reported.
title: Why did Meghan Markle leave the UK in secret last week before wedding to Prince Harry?

meta_data.description: MEGHAN MARKLE and Prince Harry are set to marry on May 19. However, a source claimed the Suits actress left the UK in secret last week? Why has Meghan left the country shortly before her wedding?
